full_text: Knitted scarf for men in DROPS Air. Piece is knitted in rib. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #almondwhisperscarf DROPS design: Pattern ai-546 Yarn group C or A + A SIZE : S/M – M/L Piece measures approx. Width = 20-25 cm Length = 180-200 cm. YARN : DROPS AIR from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group B) 150-200 g colour 55, Light Beige NEEDLES : DROPS SINGLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 4.5 mm KNITTING TENSION : 18 stitches in width and 24 rows vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 4.5 mm = 10 x 10 cm. REMEMBER: Needle size is only a suggestion! If you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles.
